name: Password Changed
description: Email to user when password change is completed

name: Permission Changed Request
description: Email to user when permissions change is requested

name: Profile Changed
description: Email to user when profile data is updated

name: Locked Account
description: Email to user if account has been locked

name: Registration Completed
description: Email to user after completing the registation process

name: Search Payment Completed
description: Email to user after receiving payment for a record search.

name: Search Completed
description: Email to user record search is completed.
